body.p: The user registration module allows the user to register his name and his laboratory. These data are saved in all the XML and CSV files generated by the EthW-OS. The user register is also used to record your program usage preferences.
Press Press “yes” or f1 to start

tutor.titulo: Fill all the fields and press

ul.li: Lab info: the name of your lab or unit o

body.p: Use at least 8 characters including letters and numbers, but no special characters

tutores.p: Após preencher os campos clique no botão save.

tutor.titulo: Seu usuario foi cadastro com sucesso!

html.body: Seu usuario foi cadastro com sucesso!
